about_the_game:
Archery RED is an impressive and immersive VR game that takes you into a thrilling futuristic science fiction world. In this extraordinary adventure, the player takes on the role of an archer who will face the challenge of overcoming a series of exacting shooting missions.



Using realistic archery mechanics, the player's task is to aim and shoot with incredible precision to eliminate targets and a variety of robotic enemies. Importantly, this is not a typical archery game. Each opponent has its own unique characteristics and ways of doing things, making strategy and tactics the key to success. Can you quickly analyze enemy behavior and adjust your shooting style?



The game offers an extensive singleplayer campaign mode that takes players through a variety of levels, each with its own set of challenges to overcome. Can you make it through all the levels and become an Archery RED champion?



For those looking for endless fun and constant challenges, the game offers an endless mode. In this mode, players can test their skills and improve their shooting technique indefinitely, trying to achieve the best possible score and earn a place on the world's list of top archers.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • VR Support: Oculus Quest 2, Meta Quest 2
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • VR Support: Oculus Quest 2, Meta Quest 2
